name: The Artist Hypertale Adventure
description:
The Artist: Hypertale Adventure, is a videogame of technological and social innovation with multiple endings, which works as an educational technological platform for the design and creation of digital content that helps propose solutions to the 17 sustainable development goals that we have in the world. , and that as a collaborative, creative, collective space, allows its users and collaborators to monetize and generate a sustainable economy through the sale of their own digital creations.

The philosophy of this project is collective, connective and collaborative creation for the design and development of educational and innovative digital content that contributes to the digital, social and educational revolution and to the country's creative industry. that benefits children, adolescents and young people from public, urban and rural institutions and low-income or vulnerable populations where there is creative and innovative potential.

 The Artist: Hypertale Adventure creates opportunities for digital creators and innovators in the creative industry, with a critical sense of the main problems that afflict us as a society, with universal values that unite us and help us understand each other better, and a vision of construction social, that generates value for the new generations of Colombia and the world.

EPISODE 1: Stranger Things Happen

Víktor Boone Cooper: Musician, Poet and Game Designer, which is equivalent to saying: "Crazy"!...and now, a so-called T.V. presenter. Show.

This lover of Cinema and the Suspense and Zombie Genres, was born on December 16, 1986, 12:06 a.m., in Universalia, West Region, Open World.

He currently lives in Universalia Village, in a cozy house in the northwest of the map. Gamer by Nature, Gamer by Leisure and Accident, and Game Designer by Vocation. Víktor Boone Cooper is working on his most recent Multiplayer Interactive Video Game project with Multiple Endings, in order to solve the 17 Sustainable Development Goals that we have in Colombia, Latin America and the World.

That night Viktor finds a mysterious letter with a strange message inside, while watching his favorite thriller series: "Dimensions of Fear".
